result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Louis Sarckees was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael Louis Sarckees is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael Louis Sarckees was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Michael Louis Sarckees was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  
*  Pay supervision fees.  
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  
If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  
*  Pay DNA surcharge.    
May not have contact with Travis Tornes, Allyxander Schmidkonz, Joseph Marshall or their residences, unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.
Restitution has been paid prior to sentencing.

records.addlTxt: NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Atty F Parise appeared on behalf of deft, who did not appear.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Expunction hearing.  Court finds deft is uneligible for expunction.
Terminated - Regular on 7-22-15
120 days KCJ with credit for 47 days as a condition of probation.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  DOC Agt Beth Koontz appeared by phone.  Court imposes 120 days conditional jail w/credit for 47 days served; Huber privileges allowed for release for school.
At the request of DOC Agt Beth Koontz a PRH is set for 11/24/14 at 1:15pm, date approved with Atty Parise.
Restitution released to victim. ds/jg  /  CK# 14CH072676
Bond applied; partial refund ds/jg
Cts 2 & 3
Cts 1 & 3
Assessment Report
$1050 total restitution due ($525 per DE)
for restitution order filed by ADA Burgoyne
Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge
Modified bond signed.

*No Contact w/ Allyxander S, TT (dob 10/3/96), Stephanie L, Joseph M or thier residences except incidentally at school.
943.10(1m)(a) Burlary of Building or Dwelling, PTAC   /   943.20(1)(a) Misd Theft, PTAC   /   946.49(1)(b) Felony BJ   /   946.49(1)(a) Misd BJ

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Court orders cash bond modified to $2,975.  Court orders restitution in the amount of $1,050 joint & several with 14CF578 (by stipulation of deft); $525 to be sent out to victim.  On State's motion, cts 1 & 3 are dismissed.  Deft pleads no contest to cts 2 & 4.  Court withholds sentence and places deft on probation for 1 year w/conditions concurrent on cts 2 & 4; pay $400 DNA surcharge; any remainder of bond to be returned to poster.  Expunction hearing set for 8/11/15 at 8:30am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Parise.  Clerk/H. Barnett.   Atty Parise acknowledges receipt and waives reading.  Deft enters not guilty pleas.  DA PTC 7/18/14 at 1:30pm and FPT 7/22/14 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State. Def. appeared in court with Atty. Frank Parise. Clerk LE. Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 6 for arraignment on 6-25-14 @ 8:15am. Information filed. Bond continued.
to Preliminary Hearing

Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Comm Mason on 5-28-14 @ 9:45 am with co-deft 14CF578.  $3500 cash bond set with conditions.

*No Contact w/ Allyxander S, TT (dob 10/3/96), Stephanie L, Joseph M or thier residences except incidentally at school.
